name: Saturday Night Live

original_info.id: Saturday Night Live: 25 Years of Music_1975
original_info.name: Saturday Night Live: 25 Years of Music

review.name: The First Five Years Will Always the Classic Years
review.reviewBody: The first five years of S.N.L. will always be the "golden era" of this show. Belushi, Akroyd, Chase, Curtain, Newman, Morris, Radner and Radner will always represent an era when some of the best comedic talent of the 1970's were all on one show and as a springboard for greatness. However, once the original cast was gone the show went in decline for me. Even though talents like Eddie Murphy, Joe Piscapo, Mike Meyers, Dana Carvey, Martin Short and Billy Crystal became big stars as a result of being on the show, the magic that the original Not Ready for Prime Time Players will never be duplicated. They made Saturday nights worth staying at home.

trailer.description: Eddie Murphy returns to "Saturday Night Live." Tonight!
trailer.name: TONIGHT
